query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_device_health_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  health_score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  availability_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  performance_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  uptime_hours DECIMAL(10,2),
  downtime_hours DECIMAL(10,2),
  error_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  warning_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  temperature DECIMAL(6,2),
  vibration DECIMAL(8,4),
  power_consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
  cycle_count INT,
  operating_hours DECIMAL(12,2),
  additional_metrics JSON,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_health_hist_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_health_hist_recorded (recorded_at),
  INDEX idx_health_hist_score (health_score)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_device_health_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  health_score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  availability_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  performance_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  uptime_hours DECIMAL(10,2),
  downtime_hours DECIMAL(10,2),
  error_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  warning_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  temperature DECIMAL(6,2),
  vibration DECIMAL(8,4),
  power_consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
  cycle_count INT,
  operating_hours DECIMAL(12,2),
  additional_metrics JSON,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_health_hist_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_health_hist_recorded (recorded_at),
  INDEX idx_health_hist_score (health_score)
);
